short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A new playground on the Spotify platform for Web3 music fans. Discover new music and share your experiences with others.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enjoy music alone, but together!

ATIV Music Playground is a new playground on the Spotify platform for Web3 music fans.

Are you tired of the same songs you've heard over and over again? Even when you want to seek new drops, you're always surrounded by musicians you've seen before.

Talented artists who want to bring their music to all of us don't get enough opportunities to promote themselves. Let's dive in and find the hidden gem to enjoy.

We've created a new space just for discover new music and share your experiences with others.

Listen to as many times as you like from the new playlists introduced each week and tell others about your experience. 

Your active behavior will be recorded as a score and you'll compete with other community members.

Your score means opportunities for new artists. Earn high scores and build strong relationships with the artists

Team up with people you know to win the competition. Win more score from the competition.

Bring the power of community to shake the troubled music scene from the bottom.
